Posts.Content: Hi, I have done a bit of research and emerging clinical studies in Asia and a lot are saying high doses of green tea in the form Matcha Powder is actually decreasing tumour sizes, reducing the relapse of breast cancer patients etc. I have since ordered Matcha in Australia and have been consuming it every day, my energy levels have since gone up and my PSA has not risen since my last treatment. Hopefully this will stay this way. I ordered from Link removed as per forum policy. Please read the rules and comply.
Posts.Title: Diet advise from a dietitian
